entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @POTUS Please return to civilian life Mr. Trump and @VP. You are not good for our country. You are making everything worse due to your poor Covid-19 response. We can do so much better America! 

@SpeakerPelosi @AP @JoeBiden @LindseyGrahamSC @DanRather @KamalaHarris @Acosta @CNN @AC360
